description_txt: stated on July 7, 2014 in campaign commercial:
quote_txt: "We cut property taxes for seniors and our middle class."

description_txt: stated on July 8, 2014 in an interview on the PBS "News Hour":
quote_txt: When undocumented children are picked up at the border and "told to appear later in court ... 90 percent do not then show up."

description_txt: stated on July 6, 2014 in an interview on CNN's "State of the Union":
quote_txt: "If you're a Mexican, you get sent back. ... But if you're from a noncontiguous country like the Central American countries" then you can stay in the United States.

description_txt: stated on July 10, 2014 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: Says Mitch McConnell voted to raise Medicare costs for a current Kentucky senior by $6,000.

description_txt: stated on July 9, 2014 in a YouTube video:
quote_txt: Says Alison Lundergan Grimes "supports Obamacare, which cuts $700 billion from seniors’ Medicare."

description_txt: stated on July 6, 2014 in comments on CNN:
quote_txt: "If you look at the states where soccer is most popular, they're overwhelmingly blue states, and the states where soccer is least popular are red states."

description_txt: stated on July 8, 2014 in a campaign TV ad:
quote_txt: "As Jim Doyle’s Commerce secretary, Mary Burke spent $12.5 million dollars to buy a vacant lot for a company that said it had no plans to create jobs in Wisconsin" and had laid off 800 workers.

description_txt: stated on July 1, 2014 in various posts on the Internet:
quote_txt: "Justice John Roberts Signed Off On Obama’s Arrest For Treason."

description_txt: stated on July 3, 2014 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: An image of nine white, blond women shows "the amazing diversity of Fox News anchors."

description_txt: stated on July 8, 2014 in a television ad:
quote_txt: Says he "voted for disaster relief and full funding of FEMA."

description_txt: stated on July 2, 2014 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Expanding Medicaid would create 63k jobs."

description_txt: stated on July 6, 2014 in an appearance on CNN's "State of the Union":
quote_txt: "In the last three years alone, 13 times, the Supreme Court, unanimously, 9-0, including all of the president's liberal picks, have struck down the president's executive orders."

description_txt: stated on July 1, 2014 in blog posts:
quote_txt: The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office "received zero complaints" about the Washington Redskins name.

description_txt: stated on June 19, 2014 in a news conference:
quote_txt: "We in this state saw more job creation in the last three years since I've been governor than you saw in the whole eight years of Doyle’s time as governor."

description_txt: stated on June 26, 2014 in a letter to taxpayers:
quote_txt: Cranston's 2014-2015 "budget funds 100 percent of the local police and fire pension and other retiree benefit costs."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • July 9, 2014

description_txt: stated on July 6, 2014 in an interview on "Meet the Press":

description_txt: stated on July 7, 2014 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Thanks to #ObamaCare, average E.R. wait in California is 5 hours."

quote_txt: "13 percent of Americans, the lowest ever, are without health care."

description_txt: stated on July 6, 2014 in interview on ABC's "This Week":
quote_txt: Says Hillary Clinton's health care plan from the 1990s "had a broader provision in favor of corporate right to back out" of providing contraceptive coverage than the one created by the Hobby Lobby Supreme Court decision.

description_txt: stated on June 19, 2014 in television ad:
quote_txt: David Perdue said he’d raise taxes.

description_txt: stated on July 1, 2014 in a TV ad:

quote_txt: President Obama has left the U.S. with the lowest number of active-duty troops since before World War II, putting the nation at risk.

description_txt: stated on July 1, 2014 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "Justin Amash is rated Michigan’s No. 1 conservative" by National Right to Life.

quote_txt: Says children are coming into the U.S. in "staggering numbers" because  President Barack Obama "has been promising amnesty."

description_txt: stated on June 24, 2014 in a letter to Milwaukee County supervisors:
quote_txt: A statewide poll showing 76 percent support and other surveys are a "strong indicator" of  broad public support in Milwaukee County for a $10.10 minimum wage

description_txt: stated on June 27, 2014 in her speech to the Texas Democratic Party state convention:
quote_txt: Says Greg Abbott "has lost" in court "four times in just the past few days."

quote_txt: Says Mark Warner has supported Harry Reid "down the line."
